name: Loch Beautiful Ness
description:
You are the Loch Ness monster.

And since you exist only on photographs, you must keep the legend alive! 
Strike a pose for all the tourists. Find the right spot in their field of view so they get the best of your image!

This was the first game I ever made for Ludum Dare, and although is not perfect, I'm very proud of what I managed to create. Made with Unity, so the "source" link has all the files and scripts I used to create the game.

Enjoy!
